title: The laird of Norlaw :
author: Oliphant
snippet: " Dr. Logan is ill," said Melmar, on one of those fairy days, when they all met round the table at lunch ; all but Mrs. Huntley, who had relapsed into her quiescent invalidism, and was made comfortable in her own room — " very ill — so ill that I may as well mind my promise to old Gordon of Ruchlaw for his minister-son."

title: The laird of Norlaw.
author: Oliphant
snippet: " Who is Gordon of Ruchlaw ? and who is his minister- son ?" asked Oswald.
